quote_first: At this moment the clock indicated
quote_last: . 'Five minutes more,' said Andrew Stuart. The five friends looked at each other. One may surmise that their heart-beats were slightly accelereted, for, even for bold gamblers, the stake was a large one.'
title: Around the world in eighty days
author: Jules Verne

quote_first: It was when I stood before her, avoiding her eyes, that I took note of the surrounding objects in detail, and saw that her watch had stopped at
quote_last: , and that a clock in the room had stopped at twenty minutes to nine.
title: Great Expectations
author: Charles Dickens
